channel.title: Item problem
channel.description: i added a new item to my server and i hade no errors compiling it, but when i use the command ::item 31000 (thats the id of the item) the item does come up on the ground under me (like its meent to do) but when i try to pick it up the client dissconnects me? any help please?

item.title: Item problem
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

You have to edit your item.java. I mean edit this:

	public static boolean[] itemIsNote = new boolean[19999];
	public static boolean[] itemSellable = new boolean[19999];
	public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[19999];
	public static boolean[] itemTradeable = new boolean[19999];
	public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[19999];

Edit that, so the numbers in the square brackets, change to 30,000.

I’m not sure however.

Read full topic

item.title: Item problem
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“aj”) || playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (/*newItemID <= 30000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}

add that

item.title: Item problem
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Try mine:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 40000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Use ::pickup ##### ##### ");
        }
    }[/code]

That places it into your inventory.
